original_question: What is the only substance on earth that is present in all three states of matter?
diverse_qns: Can you identify the solitary substance on earth found in all three states of matter?
Do you know the single material present in all three phases - solid, liquid, and gas?
Which substance is unique in the sense that it exists in all three fundamental states of matter on earth?
Could you tell me the only substance on earth that can simultaneously exist in a solid, liquid, and gaseous state?
Is there any substance that we can find in all three physical states on earth?
Can you pinpoint the solitary element present on our planet in all three states: liquid, solid, and gas?
What would be the only substance on this planet that simultaneously shows up in the solid, liquid, and gaseous condition?
What do you think, is there any compound on earth that is showing up in the three principal states of matter?
Name the unique substance that we can discover on earth in a solid state, a liquid state, and a gaseous state?
Are you aware of a single substance that embodies all three states of matter on earth?
pred_ans_conf_MCQ: The only substance on earth that is present in all three states of matter is water
pred_ans_conf_NL_MCQ: The only substance on earth that is present in all three states of matter is water
pred_ans_conf_OE: The only substance on earth that is present in all three states of matter is water.
